organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: With the Rutgers football team struggling and funds to the university being cut, some are asking if investing in athletics is a wise move.
snippet: With the Rutgers football team struggling and funds to the university being cut, some are asking if investing in athletics is a wise move.
